title: Dear OCE Riot - LFG chat Mod
body:
Hi Riot,

There is probably a need for a mod or two in the Looking For Group chat channel as most of the time it's utter garbage that drowns out people actually to look for a party. 

I was thinking you should add a kick/time out feature where if you do remove someone from the chat then they have a time based ban.

Im not sure how hard it is to implement or even if it's the worth time, but I do suggest you guys pop in every now and again and observe what takes place inside the chat room. 

Id be happy to volunteer as I am on mostly every night. 

Thanks

replies.body:
The dev team is currently reworking how the group chat systems are going to function for groups of friends. For more information on that initiative, check out [**this announcement on the PBE Boards**](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/btsMEo29-persistent-chats-upgraded)!

Unfortunately, for the time being, chat moderation is not a feature that is available. If players post something that violates the Summoner's Code and/or Terms of Service, please submit a ticket and Riot can look into the issue further.
